email_subject: the candidate we spoke about this morning...
email_body: Phillip - This is the candidate I spoke with you about this morning... Brent currently works in our London office as an Analyst and is looking to come over to the Houston office. We would like to get him into the November 1st interviews. His contact information is on the resume, but here is his number as well 44-20-778-35558 ....for a London line direct to Brent dial 844-35558 Thank you! Adrianne x57302 the resume is attached....
